_GENERAL_MESSAGES: Messages that apply to the entire app
footer: 英雄伝説/RP Recluse Cube - v{{version}}
welcomeMessage:
<{{user}}>,

 Welcome to the Eiyuu Densetsu (英雄伝説) / Kiseki RP Discord!
 We're happy to have you!
Please take a moment to view the channels viewable under Bracer Notebook, and then proceed to registering.
openExist: You already have an open request.
incorrectChannel: :x: **This command can only be used within a ticket channel**
invalidInput: :x: **There was a problem with the input you provided. Please try again.**
requestDetails:
Your room request {{channel}} has been created.
Please read the information sent and follow any instructions given.
requestDesc:
**New private room request:** {{topic}}

Thank you for reaching out to our administrative team.
Below, please briefly explain the scenario you would like to create, and who you would like to participate in. Also, please state whether you would like the room to be open to spectators or not.
Please allow up to 12-24 hours for a response from our team.
registerDetails:
Your request {{channel}} has been created.
Please read the information sent and follow any instructions given.
registerDesc:
**New registration:** {{topic}}

Thank you for the interest in joining our community!
Below, please introduce yourself to us in character. You may provide as much detail as you would like. Afterwords, briefly introduce yourself to us, and tell us why you would like to play the character you have chosen.
Please allow up to 12-24 hours for a response from our team. We hope to see you soon!
supportDetails:
Your support ticket {{channel}} has been created.
Please read the information sent and follow any instructions given.
supportDesc:
**Support Ticket:** {{topic}}

Thank you for reaching out to our administrative team.
Below, please submit the feedback or issue you would like to bring to us.
If necessary, we will reach out to you within 12-24 hours.
roomNameSet: The room name has been set
